title: Fresh Juices Now Available
description: Experience the taste of freshly squeezed juices made from the finest seasonal fruits. Our new juice bar offers a variety of healthy and delicious options for everyone.

title: New Ice Cream Flavors
description: Discover our latest ice cream creations featuring unique Persian-inspired flavors. From saffron to rose water, each scoop tells a story of tradition and innovation.

title: Premium Coffee Experience
description: Indulge in our carefully selected premium coffee beans from around the world. Every cup is crafted with passion and served with the warmth of Persian hospitality.
